= Controller Example =

for the request `http://127.0.0.1/aabot/foo/bar` the expected app resources are:







{{{
<?php
class Controller_Foo extends Base_Controller {
	
	
	public function bar() {
		$this->p_->message = "Message From ".__METHOD__;
		
		$this->layout_path = null;

	}
}
?>
